overview:
Jon St. John is a software developer and creator of ClimbingWeather.com. His current work focuses on web and mobile development.

Jon St. John has been working full-time for DriveCurrent (San Diego) since 2007. At DriveCurrent he develops the software behind major auto transport websites, including CentralDispatch.com and jTracker.com.

In 2005 he launched ClimbingWeather.com, a website that delivers accurate and timely weather forecasts for over 300 climbing areas throughout the United States. Although still a side gig for Mr. St. John, it is a passion for him. Recently, he released a mobile Android app for the website and is currently working on an iPhone version.
